title: Sam Altman Pursues Middle East Backing for Chip Venture
description: To address the burgeoning demand for semiconductors and simultaneously scale back its dependence on industry giant Nvidia, OpenAI’s Chief Executive, Sam Altman, is actively engaged in discussions with influential Middle Eastern investors and prominent chip fabricators, including Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co (TSMC). The ambitious chip venture aims to develop cutting-edge chips crucial for training and […]
